dcterms:description: This dataset contains 10,674 samples, of which 1,325 causal. Each sample is a sentence annotated with a pair of entities and the type of their relationship. Sentences with a Cause-Effect relationship are treated as causal.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2010 (Task 8)

dcterms:creator: Paramita Mirza
Rachele Sprugnoli
Sara Tonelli
Manuela Speranza
dcterms:description: In this dataset, causal sentences were identified using C-SIGNAL (causal signal) and CLINK (causal link) tags. The resulting dataset contains 2,470 sentences, of which 244 are causal.
dcterms:title: Causal-TimeBank (CausalTB)

dcterms:creator: Tommaso Caselli
Piek Vossen
dcterms:description: In this dataset, causal sentences were detected by examining the CAUSES and CAUSED BY attributes in the PLOT LINK tags. The resulting dataset contains 4,107 sentences, of which 77 are causal.
dcterms:title: Event StoryLine (EventSL)

dcterms:description: The full biomedical causal detection dataset developed by the authors contains 13,342 sentences from PUBMED, of which 7,562 are causal. The publicly available subset contains 2,000 sentences, of which 1,113 are causal.
dcterms:title: BioCausal (BioCausal-Large and BioCausal-Small)
